body_html: This would be nice to figure out with "just use PYTHONPATH" way. This way one could start ipython notebook to play around with their tensorflow changes in Jupyter, but current way is limiting you to simple_console.py
body_text: This would be nice to figure out with "just use PYTHONPATH" way.  This way one could start ipython notebook to play around with their tensorflow changes in Jupyter, but current way is limiting you to simple_console.py
body: This would be nice to figure out with "just use PYTHONPATH" way.  This way one could start `ipython notebook` to play around with their tensorflow changes in Jupyter, but current way is limiting you to `simple_console.py`
